name: Gummy Worms DEMO
description:
Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEYS - Movement (in-battle and in-game)

SPACE KEY - Interact (Attack in battle)

MOUSE - Navigate Menus

This is a demo. The full game does not have an expected release date, but is currently in development.

What is Gummy Worms?

Gummy Worms is an open world RPG game about a stickman who needs to save his world from a dark thing. But in this world, people don't fight with weapons - They play foosball all day! Can you become a foosball master and save the world?

Explore nine different areas!

Each area is home to many different and silly NPCs to talk to, with items hidden all over the place!

Take down several enemies!

Own your rivals in a casual game of foosball, and gain EXP to grow more powerful!

Ten different endings! 

Yeah, that's right, once you beat the game, you'll be able to explore nine more endings!

Enjoy the game's soundtrack? Find it here!
